changeSet.createView: SELECT COALESCE(TXN.TXNID, 0) TXNID, TXN.TRANDATE, TXN.STATUS TXNSTATUS, TR.ID, TR.TANID, TR.CERTIFICATENUMBER, TR.CERTIFICATEDATE, TR.CERTIFICATEAMOUNT, TR.UTILIZEDAMOUNT, TR.BALANCEAMOUNT, TR.ASSESSMENTYEAR, TR.DATEOFRECEIPT, TR.CERTIFICATEQUARTER, TR.DOCID, TR.VERSION, TR.RECORDSTATUS, TR.RECORDTYPE, TR.NEXTROLECODE, TR.STATUS, COALESCE(TR.WORKFLOWID,0) WORKFLOWID, TD.TANNUMBER, TD.TANHOLDERNAME FROM TDS_RECEIVABLES TR LEFT JOIN ((SELECT STATUS,TRANDATE,TXNID,RECEIVABLEID FROM TDS_RECEIVABLES_TXN WHERE STATUS <> 'RC' OR STATUS IS NULL GROUP BY STATUS,TRANDATE,TXNID,RECEIVABLEID)) TXN ON TXN.RECEIVABLEID = TR.ID INNER JOIN TAN_DETAILS TD ON TD.ID = TR.TANID

changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT TXN.TXNID, TXN.TRANDATE, TXN.VERSION, TXN.RECORDSTATUS, TXN.RECORDTYPE, TXN.ROLECODE, TXN.NEXTROLECODE, TXN.TASKID, TXN.NEXTTASKID, TXN.WORKFLOWID, TR.ID, TR.TANID, TR.CERTIFICATENUMBER, TR.CERTIFICATEDATE, TR.CERTIFICATEAMOUNT, TR.UTILIZEDAMOUNT, TR.BALANCEAMOUNT, TR.ASSESSMENTYEAR, TR.DATEOFRECEIPT, TR.CERTIFICATEQUARTER, TR.DOCID, TD.TANNUMBER, TD.TANHOLDERNAME FROM TDS_RECEIVABLES_TXN_TEMP TXN INNER JOIN TDS_RECEIVABLES TR ON TR.ID = TXN.RECEIVABLEID AND TR.STATUS IS NULL INNER JOIN TAN_DETAILS TD ON TD.ID = TR.TANID WHERE TXN.STATUS = 'AC' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT TXN.TXNID, TXN.TRANDATE, TXN.VERSION, TXN.RECORDSTATUS, TXN.RECORDTYPE, TXN.ROLECODE, TXN.NEXTROLECODE, TXN.TASKID, TXN.NEXTTASKID, TXN.WORKFLOWID, TR.ID, TR.TANID, TR.CERTIFICATENUMBER, TR.CERTIFICATEDATE, TR.CERTIFICATEAMOUNT, TR.UTILIZEDAMOUNT, TR.BALANCEAMOUNT, TR.ASSESSMENTYEAR, TR.DATEOFRECEIPT, TR.CERTIFICATEQUARTER, TR.DOCID, TD.TANNUMBER, TD.TANHOLDERNAME FROM TDS_RECEIVABLES_TXN TXN INNER JOIN TDS_RECEIVABLES TR ON TR.ID = TXN.RECEIVABLEID AND TR.STATUS IS NULL INNER JOIN TAN_DETAILS TD ON TD.ID = TR.TANID WHERE TXN.STATUS IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TDS_RECEIVABLES_TXN_TEMP WHERE TXNID = TXN.TXNID)

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO Cust_Docs (CustID, CustDocCategory) select CustID,CustDocCategory from (SELECT CustID, CustDocCategory FROM CustomerDocuments union all SELECT CustID, CustDocCategory FROM CustomerDocuments_Temp) T; update Cust_Docs set seq= ID + (select coalesce(max(DocId),0) + 1 from documentdetails_view);

changeSet.author: kavya.n
kavya.n
changeSet.sql:
UPDATE CustomerDocuments SET CustomerDocuments.id = Cust_Docs.seq FROM CustomerDocuments INNER JOIN Cust_Docs ON (CustomerDocuments.custid = Cust_Docs.custid and CustomerDocuments.CustDocCategory=Cust_Docs.CustDocCategory);
UPDATE CustomerDocuments_temp SET CustomerDocuments_temp.id = Cust_Docs.seq FROM CustomerDocuments_temp INNER JOIN Cust_Docs ON (CustomerDocuments_temp.custid = Cust_Docs.custid and CustomerDocuments_temp.CustDocCategory=Cust_Docs.CustDocCategory);

changeSet.author: kavya.n
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO CustomerDocuments cd USING (SELECT T1.Id, cd1.CustID, cd1.CustDocCategory FROM ( SELECT (select coalesce(max(DocId),0) from documentdetails_view) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cd2.CustID, cd2.CustDocCategory) Id, CustID, CustDocCategory FROM Cust_Docs cd2 )T1 INNER JOIN CustomerDocuments cd1 ON cd1.CustID = T1.CustID)T2 ON (cd.CustID = T2.CustID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cd.Id = T2.Id

changeSet.author: kavya.n
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CustomerDocuments_Temp SET ID = T2.Id from (SELECT T1.Id, cd1.CustID, cd1.CustDocCategory FROM ( SELECT (select coalesce(max(DocId),0) from documentdetails_view) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cd2.CustID, cd2.CustDocCategory) Id, CustID, CustDocCategory FROM Cust_Docs cd2 )T1 INNER JOIN CustomerDocuments_Temp cd1 ON cd1.CustID = T1.CustID)T2 WHERE CustomerDocuments_Temp.CustID = T2.CustID

changeSet.author: kavya.n
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO CustomerDocuments_Temp cd USING (SELECT T1.Id, cd1.CustID, cd1.CustDocCategory FROM ( SELECT (select coalesce(max(DocId),0) from documentdetails_view) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cd2.CustID, cd2.CustDocCategory) Id, CustID, CustDocCategory FROM Cust_Docs cd2 )T1 INNER JOIN CustomerDocuments_Temp cd1 ON cd1.CustID = T1.CustID)T2 ON (cd.CustID = T2.CustID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cd.Id = T2.Id

changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.ADDRESS, T1.ADDRESSLINE1, T1.ADDRESSLINE2, T1.ADDRESSLINE3, T1.ADDRESSLINE4, T1.COUNTRYCODE, T2.COUNTRYDESC COUNTRYNAME, T1.STATECODE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME STATENAME, T1.CITYCODE, T4.PCCITYNAME CITYNAME, T1.PINCODE, T1.PINCODEID, T8.AREANAME PINCODENAME, T1.TIN, T1.TINADDRESS, T1.TINNAME, T1.DEFAULTGST, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID FROM GST_DETAILS T1 LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.CITYCODE = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T8.PINCODEID = T1.PINCODEID INNER JOIN CUSTOMERS T5 ON T5.CUSTID = T1.CUSTID

changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.ADDRESS, T1.ADDRESSLINE1, T1.ADDRESSLINE2, T1.ADDRESSLINE3, T1.ADDRESSLINE4, T1.COUNTRYCODE, T2.COUNTRYDESC COUNTRYNAME, T1.STATECODE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME STATENAME, T1.CITYCODE, T4.PCCITYNAME CITYNAME, T1.PINCODE, T1.PINCODEID, T8.AREANAME PINCODENAME, T1.TIN, T1.TINADDRESS, T1.TINNAME, T1.DEFAULTGST, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID FROM GST_DETAILS_TEMP T1 LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.CITYCODE = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T8.PINCODEID = T1.PINCODEID INNER JOIN CUSTOMERS_TEMP T5 ON T5.CUSTID = T1.CUSTID UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID, T1.CUSTID, T5.CUSTCIF, T1.GSTNUMBER, T1.ADDRESS, T1.ADDRESSLINE1, T1.ADDRESSLINE2, T1.ADDRESSLINE3, T1.ADDRESSLINE4, T1.COUNTRYCODE, T2.COUNTRYDESC COUNTRYNAME, T1.STATECODE, T3.CPPROVINCENAME STATENAME, T1.CITYCODE, T4.PCCITYNAME CITYNAME, T1.PINCODE, T1.PINCODEID, T8.AREANAME PINCODENAME, T1.TIN, T1.TINADDRESS, T1.TINNAME, T1.DEFAULTGST, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID FROM GST_DETAILS T1 LEFT JOIN BMTCOUNTRIES T2 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T2.COUNTRYCODE LEFT JOIN RMTCOUNTRYVSPROVINCE T3 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T3.CPCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T3.CPPROVINCE LEFT JOIN RMTPROVINCEVSCITY T4 ON T1.COUNTRYCODE = T4.PCCOUNTRY AND T1.STATECODE = T4.PCPROVINCE AND T1.CITYCODE = T4.PCCITY LEFT JOIN PINCODES T8 ON T8.PINCODEID = T1.PINCODEID INNER JOIN CUSTOMERS T5 ON T5.CUSTID = T1.CUSTID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GST_DETAILS_TEMP WHERE CUSTID = T1.CUSTID AND ID = T1.ID)

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO GST_DETAILS (ID, CUSTID, GSTNUMBER, ADDRESS, ADDRESSLINE1, ADDRESSLINE2, ADDRESSLINE3, ADDRESSLINE4, COUNTRYCODE, STATECODE, CITYCODE, PINCODE, PINCODEID, TIN, TINADDRESS, TINNAME, DEFAULTGST, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID) SELECT ID, CUSTID, GSTNUMBER, GSTADDRESS, GSTADDRESS1, GSTADDRESS2, GSTADDRESS3, GSTADDRESS4, GSTCOUNTRY, GSTSTATE, GSTCITY, GSTPINCODE, GSTPINCODEID, GSTIN, GSTINADDRESS, GSTINNAME, GSTDEFAULT, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID FROM GSTDETAILS; INSERT INTO GST_DETAILS_TEMP (ID, CUSTID, GSTNUMBER, ADDRESS, ADDRESSLINE1, ADDRESSLINE2, ADDRESSLINE3, ADDRESSLINE4, COUNTRYCODE, STATECODE, CITYCODE, PINCODE, PINCODEID, TIN, TINADDRESS, TINNAME, DEFAULTGST, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID) SELECT ID, CUSTID, GSTNUMBER, GSTADDRESS, GSTADDRESS1, GSTADDRESS2, GSTADDRESS3, GSTADDRESS4, GSTCOUNTRY, GSTSTATE, GSTCITY, GSTPINCODE, GSTPINCODEID, GSTIN, GSTINADDRESS, GSTINNAME, GSTDEFAULT, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, ROLECODE, NEXTROLECODE, TASKID, NEXTTASKID, RECORDTYPE, WORKFLOWID FROM GSTDETAILS_TEMP;

T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.ACCESSTOALLBRANCHES, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS_TEMP T1 LEFT JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID LEFT JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE LEFT JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE LEFT JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL UNION ALL SELECT T1.USRID, T1.USRLOGIN, T1.USRPWD, T1.USERSTAFFID, T1.USRFNAME, T1.USRMNAME, T1.USRLNAME, T1.USRMOBILE, T1.USREMAIL, T1.USRENABLED, T1.USRCANSIGNONFROM, T1.USRCANSIGNONTO, T1.USRCANOVERRIDELIMITS, T1.USRACEXP, T1.USRACEXPDT, T1.PWDEXPDT, T1.USRACLOCKED, T1.USRLANGUAGE, T5.LNGDESC LOVDESCUSRLANGUAGE, T1.USRDFTAPPID, T2.APPCODE LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODE, T2.APPDESCRIPTION LOVDESCUSRDFTAPPCODENAME, T1.USRBRANCHCODE, T4.BRANCHDESC LOVDESCUSRBRANCHCODENAME, T1.USRDEPTCODE, T3.DEPTDESC LOVDESCUSRDEPTCODENAME, T1.USRTOKEN, T1.USRISMULTIBRANCH, T1.USRINVLDLOGINTRIES, T1.USRDESG, T6.DESGDESC LOVDESCUSRDESG, T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL, T7.CODE BUSINESSVERTICALCODE, T7.DESCRIPTION BUSINESSVERTICALDESC, T1.VERSION, T1.LASTMNTBY, T1.LASTMNTON, T1.RECORDSTATUS, T1.ROLECODE, T1.NEXTROLECODE, T1.TASKID, T1.NEXTTASKID, T1.RECORDTYPE, T1.WORKFLOWID, T1.USRDFTAPPCODE, T1.AUTHTYPE, T1.USERTYPE, T1.ACCESSTOALLBRANCHES, T1.LDAPDOMAINNAME, T1.DELETED FROM SECUSERS T1 LEFT JOIN PTAPPLICATIONDETAILS T2 ON T1.USRDFTAPPID = T2.APPID LEFT JOIN BMTDEPARTMENTS T3 ON T1.USRDEPTCODE = T3.DEPTCODE LEFT JOIN RMTBRANCHES T4 ON T1.USRBRANCHCODE = T4.BRANCHCODE LEFT JOIN BMTLANGUAGE T5 ON T1.USRLANGUAGE = T5.LNGCODE LEFT JOIN BMTDESIGNATIONS T6 ON T1.USRDESG = T6.DESGCODE LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_VERTICAL T7 ON T7.ID = T1.BUSINESSVERTICAL WHERE NOT (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SECUSERS_TEMP WHERE SECUSERS_TEMP.USRID = T1.USRID))
